english_example_sentence: If you hear a strange sound, please let us know.
russian_example_sentence: Если вы услышите странный звук, пожалуйста, сообщите нам.
turkish_example_sentence: Garip bir ses duysanız, lütfen bize haber verin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Garip bir ses ______, lütfen bize haber verin.
